body.p:
Palls Metcalfe Co Ky Aug 24th ^1862^
To the Governor of Ky
Dear sir I herewith respectfully tender my resignation as Captain of Company of the 1st Battallion of state Militia of Metcalfe County Ky
Referred to Secretary Wickliffe with the opinion that the resignation be not accepted.

Executive Dept. of Ky
Louisville
Sept. 10. 62
The Governor regrets exceedingly that he can not dispense with the valuable services of Capt. Grinstead, in the present crisis --

By order of the Governor
D. C. Wickliffe,
Sec. of State

Jn. B.
Jn. B. Huston
Jn. B. Huston
J. W. Finnell
D. C. Wickliffe
D C Wickliffe
